00032 namespace birdseed
00033 {
00034 namespace dev {
00035 // This class represents the best clustering returned by FitSNPGaussiansPriors3.
00036 
00037 Clusters::Clusters(size_t numSamples, size_t k, size_t iteration):
00038     k(k),
00039     log_likelihood(-INFINITY),
00040     means(k),
00041     vars(k),
00042     weights(k),
00043     pxi_zj(numSamples, k, 0.0),
00044     iteration(iteration)
00045 {
00046   /*
00047     std::cout << "k: " << k << "; iteration: " << iteration << "; log_likelihood: " << log_likelihood << "; means: " << matrixToString(means) << "; vars: " << matrixToString(vars) << "; covar: " << covar << "; weights: " << vectorToString(weights) << "\n";
00048     std::cout.flush();
00049   */
00050 }
00051 
00052 std::string Clusters::tostring() const
00053 {
00054   std::stringstream strm;
00055   strm << "k: " << k << "; iteration: " << iteration << "; log_likelihood: " << log_likelihood << "; means: " << matrixToString(means) << "; vars: " << matrixToString(vars) << "; covar: " << covar << "; weights: " << vectorToString(weights);
00056   return strm.str();
00057 }
00058 
00059 std::string Clusters::standardClusterString() const
00060 {
00061   // Produce a string representation of the cluster in Finny-order
00062   std::stringstream strm;
00063   size_t numClusters = (this->means.numRows());
00064   for (int i = numClusters - 1; i >= 0; --i) {
00065     double covar = this->covar * sqrt(this->vars[i][0] * this->vars[i][1]);
00066     strm << ';' <<  this->means[i][0] << ' ' << this->means[i][1] << ' '
00067     << this->vars[i][0] << ' ' << covar << ' ' << this->vars[i][1] << ' '
00068     << this->weights[i];
00069   }
00070   return strm.str();
00071 }
00072 
00073 };
00074 };
